name: Montana News Archive
tagline: Preserving our state's broadcast history for future generations
body:
### Montana News Archive
This project is about saving our state's broadcast history for generations to come. 

### Partners
This project is made possible through a partnership among the Greater Montana Foundation, the Montana Broadcaster's Association, KTVQ Billings, and Pronghorn Digital.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
